content: I did not find how to relabel my PR as S-waiting-on-review in the cargo contributor guide, and invoking rustbot did not work, is it possible to do it by myself or do I have to ask somewhere ?
Usually a comment is fine, it has about the same effect. Sorry, I'm very behind on reviews, I have quite a large queue, so I'm slowly working through them.
Oh sorry I didn’t want to pressure you ! I just thought there was a way to mark it à ready for review just so you would know next time you looked at it in the list
